    • Method Detail

      • asFullHyphenator

        public Hyphenator.FullHyphenator asFullHyphenator()
                                           throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Description copied from interface: Hyphenator
        Indicate all soft wrap opportunities by inserting soft hyphens and zero width spaces. Don't add new soft wrap opportunities to words that already have a soft hyphen or zero width space in them. Soft wrap opportunities at white space may also be omitted. Apart from the insertion of these special characters no other transformations are allowed. This means that non-standard hyphenation can not be supported through this interface.
        Specified by:
        asFullHyphenator in interface Hyphenator
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • asLineBreaker

        public Hyphenator.LineBreaker asLineBreaker()
                                     throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Description copied from interface: Hyphenator
        Break the input into lines of a preferred and maximal length. Transformations such as non-standard hyphenation are allowed. A Hyphenator.LineBreaker is not required to do any special white space processing, but it may. If the Hyphenator.FullHyphenator returned by Hyphenator.asFullHyphenator() throws a Hyphenator.NonStandardHyphenationException, the Hyphenator.asLineBreaker() method must not throw a UnsupportedOperationException.
        Specified by:
        asLineBreaker in interface Hyphenator
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException
